H0.text: What is the term for the shedding of dead skin as by reptiles and amphibians. Molting

H1.text: What is the term for the shedding of dead skin as by reptiles and amphibians. Ecdysis

H2.text: What is the term for the shedding of dead skin as by reptiles and amphibians. Shedding

H3.text: What is the term for the shedding of dead skin as by reptiles and amphibians. Sloughing

A4.text: Ecdysis is the moulting of the cuticle in many invertebrates of the clade Ecdysozoa.

A5.text: Ecdysis allows damaged tissue and missing limbs to be regenerated or substantially re-formed.
